General.Name: Hunan Kaimeite Gases Co Ltd
General.Description: Hunan Kaimeite Gases Co., Ltd. produces and sells industrial gases in China. It also engages in the research, development, production, and sale of dry ice, food additive, liquid carbon dioxide, methane, oxygen, nitrogen, hydrogen, argon, helium, neon, krypton, xenon, and other industrial gases that are widely used in beverage, metallurgy, food, tobacco, petroleum, agriculture, chemical, electronics, and other fields. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Yueyang, China.
